name: Cusano - P1 Maduro - Robusto
additionalNotes: From the minds behind AVO and Davidoff comes the Cusano P1 Maduro cigar. Cusano has a reputation for being a highly enjoyable line of cigars, albeit a bit pricey. With the P1, Cusano sought to make a premium cigar with a more modest price tag. The P1 Maduro is a great way to experience a premium cigar by Henke Kelner, without breaking the bank.
